currency.duplicate: The main currency is the same as the additional
currency.update: The base currency has been updated. Change the rates of the additional currency

editor.warning: You cannot delete a currency after saving, only adjust the exchange rate

remove.title: Attention!
remove.text: The group and its positions will be deleted

deviation.1: Allowed variance in items and quantity

fields.deviation_type: The volume of the participant's offer for the group

errors.max_price_gt_step: The maximum price is less than the change step
errors.step_gt_max_price: The change step exceeds the maximum price
errors.abs_step_unavailable: Допустимо изменение в % при подаче на часть позиций
errors.best_price_unavailable:
Value "best offer" is available if:
 • What the participants see = Competitors' offers
 • Price change rule = Reduction or Auction

fields.participants_visibility: After submitting an offer, participants see
fields.vat: When choosing a winner, it is taken into account
fields.alternative_proposals_none: Submission of alternative bids is prohibited
fields.notification_hours: A reminder to participants about the end of accepting proposals in
fields.extra_notification_hours: An additional reminder to participants about the end of accepting proposals in
fields.owner_visibility: Organizer at the stage of accepting offers

errors.alternative_proposals_out_of_range: Please enter a number between 0 and 10

tooltips.summing_up: The participants of the request will expect the decision of the tender commission within the specified period
tooltips.open_type.0: The circle of participants in the request is not limited
tooltips.open_type.1: The request is available for viewing and participation only to invited suppliers
tooltips.open_type.editable: Open – the circle of participants is not limited. Closed – available for viewing and participation only to invited suppliers
tooltips.alternative_proposals: Indicate how many alternative bids the participant can submit
tooltips.prolongation_time: Applies if the participant submits an offer within the specified time before the deadline for accepting offers. Extension up to 99 min., 0 – without extension
tooltips.notification_hours: A closing bid letter will be sent to bidders a specified time prior to the deadline for accepting bids.
tooltips.extra_notification_hours: A closing bid letter will be sent to bidders a specified time prior to the deadline for accepting bids. If a zero is specified, the reminder is not carried out
